    • Constructor Detail

      • Belt

        public Belt​(double distance,
            double incrementSpeed,
            double width,
            java.lang.String colour,
            java.lang.Double parentStarDiameter)
        Belt Constructor method. Create a Belt. Must be drawn via the Draw method to be rendered.
        Parameters:
        distance - Double value of the distance the source point of an asteroid belt.
        incrementSpeed - Double value of the incremental speed of which the ring is to rotate around the Star.
        width - Double value of the width the belt should spread from source point.
        colour - String color value the individual belt particles should be.
        parentStarDiameter - Double value of the parent star diameter.

    • Method Detail

      • Draw

        public void Draw​(SolarSystem solSys)
        Draw method for Belt objects. After initialising a large number of small Planet objects, each is drawn per frame. Would be especially better for performance to implement the use of Threads to this process.
        Specified by:
        Draw in interface Body
        Overrides:
        Draw in class Planet
        Parameters:
        solSys - Target SolarSystem object to draw belt to.

      • getWidth

        public double getWidth()
        Getter method of the width value of the asteroid belt in pixels.
        Returns:
        Double value of Belt object's width.

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth​(double width)
        Setter method of the width value of the asteroid belt in pixels.
        Parameters:
        width - Double value of Belt object's width is to be set to.
